name: Stalking Blastbones
description: Summon a flaming skeleton from the ground after 2.5 seconds. The skeleton runs after the target and explodes when it gets close to them, dealing 3600 Flame Damage to all enemies nearby.  Every second the skeleton spends chasing its target increases the damage of the explosion by 10%, up to a maximum of 50% more damage.  Creates a corpse on death.
effectLines: The skeleton deals more damage the longer it chases the target.
coefDescription: CRIMINAL ACT Summon a flaming skeleton from the ground after 2.5 seconds. The skeleton runs after the target and explodes when it gets close to them, dealing $1 Flame Damage to all enemies nearby.  Every second the skeleton spends chasing its target increases the damage of the explosion by 10%, up to a maximum of 50% more damage.  Creates a corpse on death.
